00019 CCL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00020 
00021 /* Light Path Node */
00022 
00023 __device void svm_node_light_path(ShaderData *sd, float *stack, uint type, uint out_offset, int path_flag)
00024 {
00025     float info = 0.0f;
00026 
00027     switch(type) {
00028         case NODE_LP_camera: info = (path_flag & PATH_RAY_CAMERA)? 1.0f: 0.0f; break;
00029         case NODE_LP_shadow: info = (path_flag & PATH_RAY_SHADOW)? 1.0f: 0.0f; break;
00030         case NODE_LP_diffuse: info = (path_flag & PATH_RAY_DIFFUSE)? 1.0f: 0.0f; break;
00031         case NODE_LP_glossy: info = (path_flag & PATH_RAY_GLOSSY)? 1.0f: 0.0f; break;
00032         case NODE_LP_singular: info = (path_flag & PATH_RAY_SINGULAR)? 1.0f: 0.0f; break;
00033         case NODE_LP_reflection: info = (path_flag & PATH_RAY_REFLECT)? 1.0f: 0.0f; break;
00034         case NODE_LP_transmission: info = (path_flag & PATH_RAY_TRANSMIT)? 1.0f: 0.0f; break;
00035         case NODE_LP_backfacing: info = (sd->flag & SD_BACKFACING)? 1.0f: 0.0f; break;
00036     }
00037 
00038     stack_store_float(stack, out_offset, info);
00039 }
00040 
00041 CCL_NAMESPACE_END
